faqs.question: How long does it take to see results?
faqs.answer: Most customers see their first qualified leads within 7-14 days of setup. Full campaign optimization typically shows maximum ROI within 30-45 days as our AI learns your ideal customer patterns.

faqs.question: Do you integrate with our existing tools?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have native integrations with 500+ tools including all major CRMs, email platforms, analytics tools, and marketing automation systems. Our API also supports custom integrations.

faqs.question: What kind of support do you provide?
faqs.answer: Every customer gets a dedicated Customer Success Manager, plus 24/7 technical support via chat and email. Enterprise customers also receive priority phone support and quarterly strategy reviews.

faqs.question: Can we try before we commit?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required, and you can upgrade or cancel anytime with no long-term contracts.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Security is our top priority. We're SOC2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, and use bank-level encryption. Your data is hosted on secure AWS infrastructure with 99.99% uptime guarantee.
